channel.title: Statistics on Benjamin Gravesteijn
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on Benjamin Gravesteijn

item.title: Multiple imputation
item.description: This is the tutorial for the paper “Missing data in TBI research: A five step approach for multiple imputation”. Step 1 - Exploration For the quantity and patterns of missingness VIM::aggr(dti) ### For the correlation between variables corr <- cor(sapply(dti, as.numeric), use = "pairwise.complete.obs", method = "spearman") corrplot::corrplot(corr, type = "lower") ### For overall distributions and % missingess # The first time: # library(devtools) # install_github("bgravesteijn/bgravesteijn") bgravesteijn::distr.na(dti) ### To test MAR
